mapper.select: SELECT product.*, productpics.`ppicurl`, productsize.pssellprice, productsize.`psoriprice` FROM product LEFT JOIN productpics ON product.`pid` = productpics.`pid` LEFT JOIN productsize ON product.`pid` = productsize.`pid` WHERE productpics.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productpics.`is_headpic` = 1 AND product.`is_delete` = 0 AND product.`is_together` = 1 AND productsize.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productsize.pssellprice = (SELECT MIN(productsize.pssellprice) FROM productsize WHERE product.`pid` = productsize.`pid`)

SELECT DISTINCT product.*, productpics.`ppicurl`, productsize.pssellprice, productsize.`psoriprice` FROM product LEFT JOIN productpics ON product.`pid` = productpics.`pid` LEFT JOIN productsize ON product.`pid` = productsize.`pid` WHERE productpics.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productpics.`is_headpic` = 1 AND product.`is_delete` = 0 AND product.ptypec=#{ptypec} AND productsize.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productsize.pssellprice = (SELECT MIN(productsize.pssellprice) FROM productsize WHERE product.`pid` = productsize.`pid`) ORDER BY product.`psellnum` desc

SELECT DISTINCT product.*, productpics.`ppicurl`, productsize.pssellprice, productsize.`psoriprice` FROM product LEFT JOIN productpics ON product.`pid` = productpics.`pid` LEFT JOIN productsize ON product.`pid` = productsize.`pid` WHERE productpics.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productpics.`is_headpic` = 1 AND product.`is_delete` = 0 AND product.ptypec=#{ptypec} AND productsize.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productsize.pssellprice = (SELECT MIN(productsize.pssellprice) FROM productsize WHERE product.`pid` = productsize.`pid`) ORDER BY productsize.`pssellprice`

SELECT DISTINCT product.*, productpics.`ppicurl`, productsize.pssellprice, productsize.`psoriprice` FROM product LEFT JOIN productpics ON product.`pid` = productpics.`pid` LEFT JOIN productsize ON product.`pid` = productsize.`pid` LEFT JOIN producttype ON product.`ptypea`=producttype.`tid` OR product.`ptypeb`=producttype.`tid` WHERE productpics.`is_deleted` = 0 AND productpics.`is_headpic` = 1 AND product.`is_delete` = 0 AND productsize.`is_deleted` = 0 AND (product.`pname` LIKE '%${key}%' OR product.`psummary` LIKE '%${key}%' OR producttype.`typename` LIKE '%${key}%') AND productsize.pssellprice = (SELECT MIN(productsize.pssellprice) FROM productsize WHERE product.`pid` = productsize.`pid`) ORDER BY productsize.`pssellprice`
